apis.name: Project clusters API (certificate-based) (DEPRECATED)
apis.description: Users need at least the Maintainer role to use these endpoints.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

apis.name: Get a single project cluster

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: cluster_id
attributes.description: The ID of the cluster

apis.name: Add existing cluster to project

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the cluster

attributes.name: domain
attributes.description: The base domain of the cluster

attributes.name: management_project_id
attributes.description: The ID of the management project for the cluster

attributes.name: enabled
attributes.description: Determines if cluster is active or not, defaults to true

attributes.name: managed
attributes.description: Determines if GitLab manages namespaces and service accounts for this cluster. Defaults to true

attributes.name: platform_kubernetes_attributes[api_url]
attributes.description: The URL to access the Kubernetes API

attributes.name: platform_kubernetes_attributes[token]
attributes.description: The token to authenticate against Kubernetes

attributes.name: platform_kubernetes_attributes[ca_cert]
attributes.description: TLS certificate. Required if API is using a self-signed TLS certificate.

attributes.name: platform_kubernetes_attributes[namespace]
attributes.description: The unique namespace related to the project

attributes.name: platform_kubernetes_attributes[authorization_type]
attributes.description: The cluster authorization type: rbac, abac or unknown_authorization. Defaults to rbac.

attributes.name: environment_scope
attributes.description: The associated environment to the cluster. Defaults to *

apis.name: Edit project cluster

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: cluster_id
attributes.description: The ID of the cluster

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the cluster

attributes.name: domain
attributes.description: The base domain of the cluster

attributes.name: management_project_id
attributes.description: The ID of the management project for the cluster

attributes.name: enabled
attributes.description: Determines if cluster is active or not

attributes.name: managed
attributes.description: Determines if GitLab manages namespaces and service accounts for this cluster

attributes.name: platform_kubernetes_attributes[api_url]
attributes.description: The URL to access the Kubernetes API

attributes.name: platform_kubernetes_attributes[token]
attributes.description: The token to authenticate against Kubernetes

attributes.name: platform_kubernetes_attributes[ca_cert]
attributes.description: TLS certificate. Required if API is using a self-signed TLS certificate.

attributes.name: platform_kubernetes_attributes[namespace]
attributes.description: The unique namespace related to the project

attributes.name: environment_scope
attributes.description: The associated environment to the cluster
